<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During 2012, the Company issued a restricted stock unit for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	103,306
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares to an employee. The award vests up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per yea
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	r based on the achievement of stated objectives. The objectives related to 2015 were established on January 8, 2015. In December 2015, the Board of Directors elected not to approve any payment under this award for the year ended December 31, 2015. The Company did not record any stock-based compensation expense for this award during the year ended December 31, 2015. The objectives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related to 2014 were established on January 7, 2014 and the objectives were determined to be met on January 8, 2015. The Company recorded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$158,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	based compensation expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for this award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the year ended December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	based on the achievement of the stated objectives.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The objectives related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were established on January&nbsp;15, 2013 and the objectives were determined to be met on December&nbsp;17, 2013. The Company recorded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$294,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based compensation expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for this award
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the year ended December 31, 2013 based on the achievement of the stated objectives.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During the first quarter of 2013, the Company amended the terms of certain RSUs related to a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	697,060
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock to allow for tax withholdings greater than the minimum required statutory withholding amount. As a result of this change in the terms of the awards, the outstanding RSUs are considered to be liability instruments. As a result of this modification, the Company records a liability for the fair value of the awards as of each reporting date with the change in fair value recorded through the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	consolidated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	statement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and comprehensive loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The Company will record stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based compensation expense equal to the greater of the original grant date fair value of the awards or the settlement date fair value. During the year ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company deposit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ed approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$417,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$780,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with tax authorities to settle the tax liability for awards that settled during th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e respective periods. The liability related to these awards of

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This represents the number of vested options as of December 31, 2015, plus the number of unvested options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	expected to vest as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	based on the unvested options at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	adjusted for the estimated forfeiture rate.
</FONT>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company uses the simplified method as prescribed by the Securities and Exchange Commission Staff Accounting Bulletin Topic 14.D.2 to calculate the expected term as it does not have sufficient historical exercise data to provide a reasonable basis upon which to estimate the expected term for options granted to employees. The expected term is applied to the stock option grant group as a whole, as the Company does not expect substantially different exercise or post
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;vesting termination behavior among its employee population. The computation of expected volatility is based on the historical volatility of a representative group of public biotechnology and life sciences companies with similar characteristics to the Company, including early stage of product development and therapeutic focus. The Company also considers its own historical volatility. The risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;free interest rate is based on a treasury instrument whose term is consistent with the expected term of the stock options. Management assesses expected forfeitures based on the experience of the Company coupled with comparison to data from the representative group of companies and recognizes compensation costs only for those equity awards expected to vest.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company recorded stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based compensation expense associated with employee stock options of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$7.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$7.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively. The weighted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;average grant date fair value of options granted in the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3.80
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8.61
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$6.55
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share, respectively.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The fair value of options that vested during the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014 and 2013 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$9.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$6.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	there was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$10.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million of total unrecognized compensation cost related to unvested stock options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company expects to recognize this cost over a remaining weighted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;average period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8. Income Taxes
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company had federal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and state
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	net operating loss carryforwards of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$157
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	55
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	respectively,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which are available to reduce future taxable income. The Company also had federal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and state
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	tax credits of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	respectively,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which may be used to offset future tax liabilities. The net operating loss (NOL) and tax credit carryforwards will expire at various dates through 203
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Net operating loss and tax credit carryforwards are subject to review and possible adjustment by the Internal Revenue Service and state tax authorities and may become subject to an annual limitation in the event of certain cumulative changes in the ownership interest of significant stockholders over a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;year period in excess of 50%, as defined under Sections&nbsp;382 and 383 of the Internal Revenue Code, as well as similar state provisions. This could limit the amount of tax attributes that can be utilized annually to offset future taxable income or tax liabilities. The amount of the annual limitation is determined based on the value of the Company immediately prior to the ownership change. Subsequent ownership changes may further affect the limitation in future years.
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.46%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>

	Net deferred tax asset
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has recorded a valuation allowance against its deferred tax assets at December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	because the Company&#x2019;s management believes that it is more likely than not that these assets will not be fully realized. The increase in the valuation allowance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million in the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively, primarily relates to the net loss incurred by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s reserves related to taxes are based on a determination of whether and how much of a tax benefit taken by the Company in its tax filings or positions is more likely than not to be realized following resolution of any potential contingencies present related to the tax benefit. From inception and through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	unrecognized tax benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or related interest and penalties accrued. The Company has not, as yet, conducted a study of research and development (R&amp;D) credit carryforwards. This study may result in an adjustment to the Company&#x2019;s R&amp;D credit carryforwards; however, until a study is completed and any adjustment is known,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	amounts are being presented as an uncertain tax position. A full valuation allowance has been provided against the Company&#x2019;s R&amp;D credits and, if an adjustment is required, this adjustment would be offset by an adjustment to the valuation allowance. Thus, there would be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	impact to the consolidated balance sheet or statement of operations if an adjustment were required. The Company would recognize both accrued interest and penalties related to unrecognized benefits in income tax expense. The Company&#x2019;s uncertain tax positions are related to years that remain subject to examination by relevant tax authorities. Since the Company is in a loss carryforward position, the Company is generally subject to examination by the U.S. federal, state and local income tax authorities for all tax years in which a loss carryforward is available.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9. Commitments and contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In May 2011, the Company entered into a non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;cancelable operating lease for office and laboratory space, which expired on October&nbsp;31, 2014. The lease agreement provided for free rent for the first
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	months of the lease term and included escalating rent payments. Rent expense was recorded on a straight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;line basis over the lease term,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

	Verastem,&nbsp;Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	accordingly. The Company secured a letter of credit for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$86,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in connection with the lease, which was released upon expiration of the lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On April 15, 2014, the Company entered into a lease agreement for approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	15,197
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	square feet of office and laboratory space in Needham, Massachusetts. The lease term commenced on April 15, 2014 and expires on September 30, 2019. The Company began using the leased premises as its corporate headquarters and commenced rent payments effective September 22, 2014. The Company has agreed to pay an initial annual base rent of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$493,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which base rent increases after every
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	twelve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-month period during the lease term to approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$554,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the last twelve-month period. The Company is recording rent expense on a straight-line basis, beginning in April 2014. The Company also received a tenant improvement allowance of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$684,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in connection with the lease. The Company has accounted for the allowance as a lease incentive, which is being recorded as a reduction to rent expense over the lease term. Deferred rent and lease incentive obligation are included in accrued expenses (current portion) and other liabilities (noncurrent portion) in the consolidated balance sheet
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The Company has also agreed to pay its proportionate share of increases in operating expenses and property taxes for the building in which the leased space is located. The Company has provided a security deposit in the form of a letter of credit in the amount of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$203,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which may be reduced to approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$162,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on April 15, 2016. The amount is included in long term restricted cash on the consolidated balance sheet
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</TD>

	542
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company recorded rent expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$352,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$541,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$366,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the years ended December
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Pursuant to the terms of various agreements, the Company may be required to pay various development, regulatory and commercial milestones. In addition, if any products related to these agreements are approved for sale, the Company may be required to pay significant royalties on future sales. The payment of these amounts, however, is contingent upon the occurrence of various future events, which have a high degree of uncertainty of occurring.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10. License agreements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In October 2010, the Company entered into an exclusive license agreement, which was amended and restated in January 2012, with the Whitehead Institute for Biomedical Research (the Licensor) for certain intellectual property. The Company paid the Licensor an upfront license fee and reimbursed patent related fees and costs incurred by the Licensor and affiliates of the Licensor totaling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$104,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in the aggregate and issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	166,664
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock to the Licensor and entities and individuals affiliated with the Licensor. The fair value of the common stock was determined to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.28
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share, and the fair value was determined to be more readily determinable than the fair value of the license. As a result, the fair value of the shares of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$46,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was recorded as research and development expense. Under the terms of the agreement, the Company also agreed to pay annual license maintenance fees, milestone payments, royalties as a percentage of net sales and a percentage of sublicense income the Company receives. Annual license maintenance fees are creditable against royalties earned during the same calendar year and are not material to the financial statements. Milestone payments are triggered upon the achievement of specified development, regulatory and commercialization milestones and are not creditable against royalties. Actual amounts due under the agreement will vary depending on the number of products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">

</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage109"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VSTM-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Verastem,&nbsp;Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(Continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	developed, the type and development path of the products, and other related factors. Milestone payments could total up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million. The Company may terminate the agreement at any time with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	90
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;days&#x2019; prior written notice.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On December&nbsp;16, 2011, the Company amended and restated an existing non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;exclusive license agreement with the Licensor pursuant to which the Company obtained an exclusive license to certain intellectual property. The Company paid the Licensor an upfront license fee and agreed to make milestone payments of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$825,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	upon the achievement of specified regulatory and commercialization milestones. In addition, the Company agreed to pay royalties as a percentage of net sales of licensed products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Under the license agreement with Poniard that the Company entered into in November 2011 relating to VS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;4718 and certain other compounds, the Company paid an upfront license fee and agreed to pay Poniard milestone payments upon the achievement of specified development and regulatory milestones. In February 2014, the Company purchased the assets which were the subject of the license agreement with Poniard from Encarta, Inc. (&#x201C;Encarta&#x201D;), who had previously purchased these assets in 2013. In consideration for these assets, the Company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	97,500
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock, a warrant to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	142,857
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock with an exercise price equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$17.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share and paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$25,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. All existing obligations under the license agreement, including an achieved development milestone and an obligation to issue a warrant, were settled as part of this transaction. The Company incurred
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million of research and development expense in 2014 as a result of this transaction. In connection with the asset purchase agreement, the Company also assumed the rights and obligations under the Scripps License Agreement. Pursuant to the Scripps License Agreement, the Company is obligated to pay Scripps potential product development milestone payments of up to an aggregate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	upon the achievement of specified development and regulatory milestones. In addition, the Company is obligated to pay Scripps low single
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;digit royalties as a percentage of net sales of licensed products, subject to adjustments in certain circumstances. The Company&#x2019;s obligation to pay royalties on net sales is on a country by country basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On May&nbsp;11, 2012, the Company acquired from S*Bio Pte&nbsp;Ltd (S*Bio), compounds identified as dual inhibitors of PI3K and mTOR, including related patent rights. Under the agreement, the Company paid S*Bio an upfront fee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$350,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and has agreed to pay S*Bio milestone payments of up to an aggregate of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$21.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million upon the achievement of specified development and regulatory milestones. In addition, the Company agreed to pay to S*Bio tiered, low to mid single digit royalties as a percentage of annual net sales of each product containing an acquired compound as an ingredient. The obligation to pay royalties continues on a product by product and country by country basis until the expiration of all acquired patent rights covering the product in such country. If the Company obtains a license from a third party in order to commercialize an acquired compound contained in a product in a particular country, then the Company may deduct up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the amount paid to such third party from the royalty payments that Company owes to S*Bio for such product. The deduction is subject to specified limitations, including that in no event will any such deduction reduce a royalty payment owed to S*Bio by more than 50% as a result of all such deductions in the aggregate. There were no ongoing clinical trials at the time of the acquisition of the compounds, and the compounds acquired do not have alternative future uses, nor have they reached a stage of technological feasibility. As no processes or activities were acquired, the Company accounted for the transaction as an asset acquisition by recording the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$350,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	payment made to S*Bio to research and development expense for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2012.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On July&nbsp;11, 2012, the Company entered into a license agreement with Pfizer&nbsp;Inc. (Pfizer), under which Pfizer granted the Company worldwide, exclusive rights to research, develop, manufacture and commercialize products containing certain of Pfizer&#x2019;s inhibitors of focal adhesion kinase (Products) for all therapeutic, diagnostic and prophylactic uses in humans. The Company is solely responsible, at its expense, for the clinical development of the Products, which is to be conducted in accordance with an agreed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;upon development plan. The Company is also responsible for all manufacturing and commercialization activities at its own expense. Pfizer is required to provide the Company with an initial quantity of clinical supply of one of the Products for an agreed upon price. Under the agreement, the Company made a one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;time cash payment to Pfizer in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	192,012
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of its common stock. Pfizer is also eligible to receive up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million in developmental milestones and up to an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$125
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million based on the successful attainment of regulatory and commercial sales milestones. Pfizer is also eligible to receive high single to mid double digit royalties on future net sales of Products. The Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VSTM-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Verastem,&nbsp;Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(Continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:11.7647058823529%;MARGIN-RIGHT:11.7647058823529%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	royalty obligations with respect to each Product in each country begin on the date of first commercial sale of the Product in that country, and end on the later of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;years after the date of first commercial sale of the Product in that country or the date of expiration or abandonment of the last claim contained in any issued patent or patent application licensed by Pfizer to the Company that covers the Product in that country. The Company accounted for the license agreement as the licensing of in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;process research and development with no alternative future use. Accordingly, the Company recorded research and development expense for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2012 associated with the cash payment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and the fair value of shares of common stock issued to Pfizer of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11. Employee benefit plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In June 2011, the Company adopted a 401(k) retirement and savings plan (the 401(k) Plan) covering all employees. The 401(k) Plan allows employees to make pre
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;tax or post
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;tax contributions up to the maximum allowable amount set by the IRS. Under the 401(k) Plan, the Company may make discretionary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	contributions as approved by the board of directors. The Company made
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	approximate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	contributions to the 401(k) Plan of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	295
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	219
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$160,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4 and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12. Reduction in force
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In October 2015, the Company announced a reduction of workforce by approximately 50% to 20 full time employees. All affected employees will receive severance pay and outplacement assistance. As a result of the reduction in force and associated costs, the Company estimates one-time severance and related costs of $1.1 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;Of these one-time severance and related costs, approximately $349,000 was paid through December 31, 2015 and approximately $713,000 will be paid in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	13. Quarterly f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	inanc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ial i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	nformation (unaudited, in thousands, except per share data)
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Filed herewith.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&#x2020;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Confidential treatment granted as to portions of the exhibit. Confidential materials omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Confidential treatment requested under 17 C.F.R. &#xA7;200.80(b)(4) and Rule&nbsp;24b

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

	John B. Green

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Re
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Part-Time Employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Dear Jack:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This letter memorializes certain mutual understandings with respect to your employment with Verastem, Inc. (the "Company"). Reference is made to the Employment Agreement between you the Company, dated as of March 10, 2013 (the "Employment Agreement"). This letter supplements (and, to the extent of any conflict, supersedes) the Employment Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We anticipate that, effective January 1, 2016, you will be employed on a part-time basis, working three (3) days per week at approximately sixty percent (60%) of your current full-time schedule. For so long as you continue to be employed by the Company on this part-time basis, the Company will pay you a base salary at the rate of $202,800, representing sixty percent (60%) of your base salary on the date of this letter (your "Current Base Salary"). You will continue to be employed on such part-time basis until otherwise agreed to in writing between you and the Company, or until your employment is terminated by you or the Company in accordance with Section 4 of the Employment Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Further, it is our shared understanding that in the event your employment with the Company is terminated (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	) by the Company other than for Cause as defined in the Employment Agreement, or (ii) by you with or without Good Reason as defined in the Employment Agreement, such termination will be treated as a termination by the Company other than for Cause for all purposes. In the event of any such termination, for purposes of Section 5(a)(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	) of the Employment Agreement your "then-current annual base salary" shall mean the base salary at the rate of $338,000, being one hundred percent (100%) of your base salary as of the date of this Letter.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company will reimburse you for your reasonable and actual legal fees incurred in connection with the negotiation of this letter following receipt of such substantiation and documentation of these expenses as may be reasonably requested by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This letter may not be modified or amended, and no breach will be deemed to be waived, except by a written agreement, signed by an authorized officer of the Company and by you. Except as expressly provided herein, your Employment Agreement will continue in full force and effect in accordance with its terms. This letter is a Massachusetts contract and will be governed and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, without regard to
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="VSTM-20151231EX3111989DA_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;31.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I, Robert Forrester certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K of Verastem,&nbsp;Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 1PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:49.38%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT 4.3PT;">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="VSTM-20151231EX312F32BBD_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;31.2
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I, John B. Green, CPA, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K of Verastem,&nbsp;Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f) and 15d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:33.32%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:17.70%;PADDING:0PT;">

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:33.32%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:17.70%;PADDING:0PT;">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_32>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_32"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="VSTM-20151231EX321C8EB8C_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;32.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In connection with the Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;K of Verastem,&nbsp;Inc. (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	) for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	SEC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	) on the date hereof (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Report
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	), the undersigned, Robert Forrester, Chief Executive Officer of the Company, hereby certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Oxley Act of 2002, that to my knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
